comments.creator: jk1700@gazeta.pl
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110101 Firefox/4.0b9pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110101 Firefox/4.0b9pre

It's possible to activate "find on page" after showing tab modal prompt

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. type javascript:alert('test') in url bar and press enter
2. press Ctrl-F (or /)

Actual Results:  
"Find on page" search field appears

Expected Results:  
"Find on page" search field should not appear. 
Or maybe it should? Should we treat it as a bug or as a benefit of tab modal prompts?
